titles.title: Protecting Access to Student Transcripts Act of 2019
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to prohibit institutions of higher education from denying students access to transcripts because of loan default.
Protecting Access to Student Transcripts Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Protecting Access to Student Transcripts Act of 2019
This bill prohibits institutions of higher education that participate in federal student-aid programs from denying students' access to their transcripts, degree scrolls, or other certifications because of loan default.
